      Subclasses of Instrument in BikeSack 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BooleanInstrument
      The BooleanInstrument Class extends BikeSack's abstract Instrument This class allows for an Instrument with a Boolean value.
      class  HeadlightInstrument
      Bike Sack HeadlightInstrument Class
      class  RangeInstrument
      RangeInstrument extends BikeSack's abstract Instrument and allows for an instrument with a proportional value.
      class  TextualInstrument
      Provides an Instrument which as oriented around displaying text.
      class  UsageInstrument
